rows.label: tlk41700321_06_msg0001
rows.name:
The number of refugees from Superbia
just keeps growing.

rows.label: tlk41700321_06_msg0002
rows.name:
I hear Acedia sank near the World Tree, and so
everyone evacuated to Superbia and Invidia
all at once.

rows.label: tlk41700321_06_msg0003
rows.name:
And so, some of the people from Superbia wanted to
evacuate to the safety of Gula, and came flocking
here in great numbers.

rows.label: tlk41700321_06_msg0004
rows.name:
It might not be my place to say, but Superbia's
situation is much better than Acedia's.

rows.label: tlk41700321_06_msg0005
rows.name:
I could understand if it were people from Acedia
evacuating here, but most of them are Superbians...

rows.label: tlk41700321_06_msg0006
rows.name:
I wish they would just endure and live there, but it feels
like we're just being conveniently used.

rows.label: tlk41700321_06_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, we will accept them. It's not as if everyone will
welcome them unanimously, though.
